711609f-a.text:
22nd Street, north side, east from No. 321 to Eighth Avenue. St. Paul's German Lutheran Church, 315 West 22nd Street, is seen to the centre. September 7, 1927

P.L. Sperr

710114f-a.text:
Eighth Avenue, west side, north from 22nd Street.
June 27, 1928.
P.L. Sperr,Photographer.

711610f-a.text:
(1)
22nd Street, north side, west from Eighth Avenue. In the centre is St. Paul's German Lutheran Church, 313 West 22nd Street.
June 27, 1928
P. L. Sperr.
Neg. # 980

(2)
The same, west to Ninth Avenue.
March 12, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

710113f-a.text:
Eighth Avenue, east side, north across W. 22nd Street. Views 2 and 3 are photographed from a point slightly above same. Note the absence of the street car tracks observed in the earlier views. These were remoed by the C. W. A., subsequent
to subway construction underground.
June 25, 1928
February 13, 1932
May 10, 1939
P. L. Sperr

711608f-a.text: 267 West 22nd Street and west to N.E. corner of Eighth Avenue. April 20, 1933. P. L. Sperr.

710115f-a.text:
Eighth Avenue, west side, between 22nd and 23rd Streets.
Truck is in front of No. 251.
January 22, 1929.
P.L. Sperr,Photographer.
